moTa: The Ferrari 488 GTB is available as a coupe. The 2018 488 GTB starts at $252,800 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $3,750. It gets EPA-estimated 18 MPG combined. The Ferrari 488 GTB competes against models like the Rolls-Royce Wraith, Porsche 911, and Aston Martin Vanquish. The 488 GTB is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .

The Ferrari 488 Spider competes against models like the Lamborghini Huracan, Mercedes-Benz AMG S 65, and Rolls-Royce Dawn.
